body: The book contains animate dead, bull's strength, geas/quest, and limited wish. The reader may treat her caster level as one level higher than normal for the purpose of crafting a flesh golem. Moderate enchantment, necromancy [evil], and transmutation; CL 8th; Craft Construct, creator must be caster level 8th, animate dead, bull's strength, geas/quest, limited wish.
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Magic Items/Wondrous Items/Golem Manual/Description/Flesh Golem Manual
name: Flesh Golem Manual
